channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: He also showed concern that Americans are at risk of growing an extra ear.

item.title: Giorgio Armani, legendary Italian fashion designer, dies at 91
item.description: Armani co-founded the luxury fashion house that bore his name in 1975 in Milan, Italy.

item.title: Applications for US jobless benefits rise last week but remain in healthy range

item.title: Spirit Airlines to end service in 12 cities as rivals swoop in
item.description: Spirit has flown in and out of bankruptcy as the discount carrier struggles with rising costs and heavy debts.

item.title: RFK Jr. hearing live updates: RFK Jr. to face grilling over CDC turmoil, vaccines
item.description: The hearing comes after the ouster of Susan Monarez as CDC director.

item.title: 2 tourists fall to their deaths in separate incidents near Alaska glacier
item.description: A hiker from Arizona and an Italian man died in separate falling incidents this week near Alaska's Mendenhall Glacier, troopers said.

item.title: Watch Live: RFK Jr. testifies at Senate hearing amid CDC backlash
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is testifying Thursday before the Senate Finance Committee. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Texas lawmakers approve letting private citizens sue abortion pill providers

Judge reverses Trump administration’s cuts of billions of dollars to Harvard University
item.description: A federal judge in Boston has ordered the reversal of over $2.6 billion in federal funding cuts to Harvard University.
